about_the_game:
Compete with friends in this chaotic multiplayer hardware store simulator! Build your empire, sabotage competitors' pricing strategies, and handle the mayhem of daily retail operations - all while trying to become the town's premier hardware destination.

🏗️ CHAOS MEETS COMMERCE

  • Watch products tumble as you and your staff race to restock shelves

  • Deal with the physics-based chaos of retail life

  • Navigate crowded aisles during flash sales

  • Frantically reorganize displays to outshine competitors

🤝 TRUE COMPETITIVE MULTIPLAYER

  • Battle up to 3 other players in the same bustling town

  • Feel the real impact when competitors undercut your prices

  • Race to stock trending products before your rivals

  • Adapt your strategy as other players influence the market

📊 DEEP RETAIL WARFARE

  • Strategically price items to steal customers from competitors

  • Monitor rival stores' tactics in real-time

  • Turn market events into opportunities

  • Transform your store to counter others' specializations

💼 DYNAMIC RETAIL ECOSYSTEM

  • Experience a living economy that reacts to all players' actions

  • Watch customers choose between competing stores

  • Create price wars that affect everyone's bottom line

  • Deal with the ripple effects of other players' business decisions

🌟 KEY FEATURES

  • Physics-based item interactions add unpredictable fun

  • Real-time competitive multiplayer for up to 4 players

  • Dynamic market affected by all players' decisions

  • Complete store design freedom

  • Deep management systems

  • Employee hiring and management

  • Warehouse logistics

Will your store rise to the top through careful management, or will you embrace the chaos and outmaneuver your rivals? Jump into Hardware Store Simulator and find out!

----

Note: The game supports single-player and multiplayer modes for up to 4 players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Compete with up to 4 players to build the most successful hardware store! Design your shop, manage inventory, hire employees, and influence market prices in this detailed business simulator. Master retail management as you expand your store empire.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
